name: Business Credit Substitute
description:
BCS aims to build a blockchain-based retail commercial credit economy ecosystem.

BCS uses self-optimized POBC (goodwill certification) as the underlying consensus mechanism and aims to introduce the real world credit system to provide better operation and support for anonymous blockchain networks. BCS focuses on the retail industry and aims to support supply chain traceability, quantifiable credit, transparent data, consumer shopping, membership services, precision marketing, and centralized procurement scenarios.
